name: Halia Thornton

goals: Eliminate Redbrands to take over their operation
personality.mannerisms: Professional, records everything, cold smile, always thinking several moves ahead

role: Guildmaster of Miner's Exchange. Secret Zhentarim agent working to control town through wealth.
quest: Kill Glasstaff, bring any correspondence from his quarters. Offers 100 gp. Has ulterior motive - wants to take over Redbrand operation herself.
information: Knows Redbrands have goblin minion who might know Cragmaw Castle location
recruitment: If party eliminates Glasstaff, approaches members who share Zhentarim values (wealth, power) to join. Awards title of 'Fang'.
secret_agenda: If Glasstaff captured, breaks him out of jail (if no guards posted) to interrogate about Wave Echo Cave
